response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs perfectly. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $14,000. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, and I hope you will find this offer compelling. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
